bibl.title: Miscellaneous Berlin Ostraka.
bibl.note: Most pieces belong to the Wilcken Collection. - 1. Inv. 25485. Receipt for merismÒw. Elephantine, A.D. 180. - 2. Inv. 25476. Receipt for Tax on Public and Katoikic Land.
